ProductInfo.Features:
Multi-Coated 28mm Glass Lens: The heart of the Horizon Kompakt is its multi-element, multi-coated 28mm glass lens that yields sharp images with vivid colors and rich contrast
Swing-Lens Technology: Cocking the Horizon's shutter charges the clockwork mechanics, and touching the shutter release sets the lens into motion
Fixed f/8 Aperture: The fixed f/8 aperture yields excellent depth of field (not too short and not too long), sharpness and clarity
Easy Double Exposures: Users can fire the shutter as many times as desired without advancing the film. The uncoupled advance enables double, triple, quadruple, or more exposures on the same frame
Battery Free Operation: The Horizon Kompakt is powered by a classic clockwork motor...no batteries required
ProductInfo.Name: Lomography 959 Horizon Kompakt 35mm Panoramic Camera, 120 deg. Panoramic Pictures
